author: Reuters Editorial
title: Zona euro, economic sentiment scende a febbraio, migliora solo fiducia servizi Macroeconomia
text: BRUSSELS, Feb 27 (Reuters) - The European Commission released on Tuesday the following data for economic sentiment and the business climate in the euro zone in February. EURO ZONE FEB JAN DEC Economic sentiment 114.1 114.9 115.3 Industry 8.0 9.0 8.8 Services 17.5 16.8 18.0 Consumer 0.1 1.4 0.5 Retail trade 4.3 5.2 6.0 Construction 4.2 4.7 3.1 Producer price expectations 12.6 12.4 13.0 Consumer price expectations 18.0 19.6 13.6 Business climate 1.48 1.56 1.59 For European Commission data click on: here . la parola “Pagina Italia” o “Panorama Italia”
